findings.details: Hero headline is strong, but a compact eyebrow label can improve scanning on mobile and reinforce positioning.
Quick scan of http/https references in posts/pages did not reveal placeholder or example links. Live verification not executed in this run.
Global SEO tags and page descriptions present; no critical gaps observed.
Hero copy is clear; adding a short label improves scannability for first-time visitors.

recommendations: Add a concise hero eyebrow label on the homepage to reinforce positioning and improve scanability
